title: Working together
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Outlines ways in which parents can become actively involved in the running of their local school. Shows how at various schools throughout the state parents are helping with children’s reading, writing, mathematics, typing, school displays and review of school policy.
creator_credit_for_label: Chris O’Rourke and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
